channel.title: RebornPK -My Project #508
channel.description:
I won't update the advertise section so often i guess i can show you guys my project aswell and update pictures & videos & features.
Im programming this myself and i do have school , won't be doing this very fast.
[B]Why am i programming this?:[/B] -I' want to learn more of java programming -I get money for doing this. -I want to remake RuneScape PKing and make it realistic ,but still keep the economy and the most important parts of it. -Understanding most things of making game ,Which i understand now.
[B]Features:[/B] -Most lunar spells about 80% -All ancients -Ice spells only have sounds and damage delays atm. -Barrows 99% -The coffin randomize haven't been added yet. -PlayerVsPlayer -Combat System 90% (Note it's only the system not specials,sounds etc..),
-pCombat includes : *xLogging Fixed *Correct damage delays for Ranged,Magic,Melee *Correct defence system for Npcs,Players. *Sound effects for most weapons. *Specials for most weapons that are released in-game.
Remade totally, started from scratch. -NpcVsPlayer -Combat System 80% (Note it's only the system not npc attackstyles,sounds etc.) -PlayerVsNpc - 48% .Haven't really worked on PvN yet, after PlayerVsPlayer i move to NPC combat and PvN. *Not remade yet. -God Wars 60% -Most of NPC spawns ,Drops, Killcounts, missing attackStyles and emotes. -Desert Treasure 60% -Diamond holders AI, Quest logs, Damis version #2 spawn after death. -Modern spells on Players & Npcs -Remade and has got timer. -Sound effects, about 40% of Player related actions. -Npc and Player Combat related defence bonuses,(PvN,PvP) -KBD 6 Attack styles( Not sure how many was there for real o.O) -Npc Combat AI System. -Remade & deleted some skills.
[B]Pictures & Videos:[/B] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vcj-UKVqzVg
Soz for that music on vid, normal music got muted O.o

item.title: RebornPK -My Project #508
item.dc:creator: @_RSC_Coder ¤RSC[]Coder¤
item.description:
@_RSC_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Denoria, post:6, topic:268300”][quote author=faded vision link=topic=354106.msg2713126#msg2713126 date=1237452505]

[quote author=¤RSC[]Coder¤ link=topic=354106.msg2713089#msg2713089 date=1237443059]

Why am i programming this?:
-I get money for doing this.
[/quote]

JaGeX Lawsuit[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2009, 02:52:25 am[/size][hr]Barrows looks good, you should remove stuff like options to tell npc’s to fuck off if your making a serious server and are serious about java
[/quote]Technicly they can’t do shit since it’s not on a webclient, And if you think it’s the lawsuit why are you here :D[/quote]
Yes they can, If there’s link to your client on forums/website to something RS related.
I know this because ive had a RSC Server ,when they looked at it ,they e-mailed me right away and asking to shut it down ,at first i didnt take it down but when they made offical court request,then i did, because having server up for fun ,im not gonna pay 3000$ for that.

Read full topic

item.title: RebornPK -My Project #508
item.dc:creator: @_RSC_Coder ¤RSC[]Coder¤
item.description:
@_RSC_Coder wrote:

I won’t update the advertise section so often i guess i can show you guys my project aswell and update pictures & videos & features.

Im programming this myself and i do have school , won’t be doing this very fast.

Why am i programming this?:
-I’ want to learn more of java programming
-I get money for doing this.
-I want to remake RuneScape PKing and make it realistic ,but still keep the economy and the most important parts of it.
-Understanding most things of making game ,Which i understand now.

Features:
-Most lunar spells about 80%
-All ancients -Ice spells only have sounds and damage delays atm.
-Barrows 99% -The coffin randomize haven’t been added yet.
-PlayerVsPlayer -Combat System 90% (Note it’s only the system not specials,sounds etc…),

-pCombat includes :
*xLogging Fixed
*Correct damage delays for Ranged,Magic,Melee
*Correct defence system for Npcs,Players.
*Sound effects for most weapons.
*Specials for most weapons that are released in-game.

Remade totally, started from scratch.
-NpcVsPlayer -Combat System 80% (Note it’s only the system not npc attackstyles,sounds etc.)
-PlayerVsNpc - 48% .Haven’t really worked on PvN yet, after PlayerVsPlayer i move to NPC combat and PvN.
*Not remade yet.
-God Wars 60% -Most of NPC spawns ,Drops, Killcounts, missing attackStyles and emotes.
-Desert Treasure 60% -Diamond holders AI, Quest logs, Damis version #2 spawn after death.
-Modern spells on Players & Npcs -Remade and has got timer.
-Sound effects, about 40% of Player related actions.
-Npc and Player Combat related defence bonuses,(PvN,PvP)
-KBD 6 Attack styles( Not sure how many was there for real o.O)
-Npc Combat AI System.
-Remade & deleted some skills.

Pictures & Videos:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vcj-UKVqzVg

Soz for that music on vid, normal music got muted O.o

Read full topic
